fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
head_office_address: 7 Regent Park, Booth Drive Park Farm
eu_initiatives:
Anitox engages with the European Union institutions in the following policy areas: 
- Feed additives Regulation 
- Animal nutrition, Food Hygiene 
- Animal health and welfare 
- Biocidal products Regulation 
- REACH Regulation 
- National programmes for the control of zoonoses (incl. Salmonella)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- Formaldehyde Biocides Interest Group (FABI) 
- FEFANA (EU Association of Specialty Feed Ingredients and their Mixtures) 
- FEFANA HYFAC (Hygiene of the Feed Chain Authorisation Consortium)
goals__remit: Anitox develops products and services to safely control pathogens and microbes in animal feeds, pet foods and ethanol fermentation systems worldwide. Anitox is headquartered in Georgia, United-States, with operational bases throughout the world.
